summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2242, for the improvement of Market Street, from 8th Avenue Northwest to 15th Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, resurfacing and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 23079 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
